import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import * as chartData from '../../../../../shared/data/dashboard/ecommerce' @Component({ selector: 'app-monthly-order', templateUrl: './monthly-order.component.html', styleUrls: ['./monthly-order.component.scss'] }) export class MonthlyOrderComponent { public monthlyOrderChart = chartData.monthlyOrderChart; public show: boolean = false constructor() { } toggle() { this.show = !this.show } }
